import React from 'react' import './Header.scss' import Logo from '../../Assets/Logo.svg' import CartItem from '../CartItem/CartItem' import CartDropDown from '../Cart/CartDropDown' import {auth} from '../../Firebase/FirebaseUtils' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {connect} from 'react-redux' const Header = ({currentUser}) => (
SHOP CONTACT { currentUser ? (
auth.signOut()}>SIGN OUT
) : ( SIGN IN ) }
) const mapStateToProps = state => ({ currentUser: state.user.currentUser }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Header)
